History of Pelee

Discover the origins and evolution of this fascinating digital city on planet Drenio.

Pelee Timeline

Foundation of Pelee

Digital Era 2847

The digital city of Pelee was founded as the first technological settlement on planet Drenio, establishing the foundations for a completely digital civilization.

District Division

Digital Era 2851

The division of Pelee into 30 specialized districts was established, each with specific functions to optimize urban and social organization.

Great Expansion

Digital Era 2856

Pelee experienced its greatest growth, expanding its boundaries and developing the technological infrastructure that characterizes it today.

Modern Era

Digital Era 2860 - Present

Pelee becomes the most advanced digital metropolis on Drenio, being a model of innovation and sustainable technological development.
